TranslationSet.Name: English
TranslationSet.Translation: We could not create a log file in the mebsSchedulingSystem application directory. This is usually due to UAC permissions. Please run mebs with administrator access. mebs requires write permission to the application folder to work properly. ([MESSAGE]). Do you want to continue?
Please select a valid location to save media
Could not set external port mapping via uPNP. Please configure manually the port forwarding .
